Document.Element: cbc:CustomizationID Specification identificationIdentifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction.Identifier tir16-002 PEPPOL-T126-R001 urn:fdc:peppol.eu:logistics:trns:transportation_status_request:1

cbc:ProfileID Profile IDIdentifies the Peppol profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.Identifier tir16-001 PEPPOL-T126-R002 urn:fdc:peppol.eu:logistics:bis:transportation_status_w_request:1

cbc:ID Document identifierAn transaction instance must contain an identifier. The identifier enables positive referencing the document instance for various purposes including referencing between transactions that are part of the same process.Identifier tir16-003 TSR_1
cbc:IssueDate Issue DateThe date when the Transportation Status Request was issued. Format = "YYYY-MM-DD".Date tir16-004 2011-10-06
cbc:IssueTime Issue TimeThe time when the Transportation Status Request was issued.Time tir16-005 PEPPOL-T123-R018 09:29:30+02:00
